lines.name: BRAIN
lines.text: Are we on the internet? Denise?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Denise isn't here, babe, we're on vacation.

lines.name: BRAIN
lines.text: [upbeat music]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't have a host.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've really never had to deal with this before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, this is new.

lines.name: DENISE
lines.text: Hello!

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Denise?

lines.name: DENISE
lines.text: Say hello to everybody first!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi guys, welcome to Talk Machina!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need an adult.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have no adults here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're gonna have a Critmas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Welcome to Critmas in May. We decided that we would make a mess of the studio instead of Matt and Marisha's house for once.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's still a pile of cardboard from our past Critmas. Need to handle that. Had to handle our yard first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How's that going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We fill up the trash bin or the yard bin once a week. We think it's gonna be about a six-week endeavor to keep filling the trash bin with yard clippings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay 100th episode! It'll be great!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My yard will still maybe look like we're cooking meth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By then all the weeds will have grown back!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're already trying to turn again aren't they?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well actually now it's kinda happened because the piles of leaves, the grass underneath is just dying. It's going the extreme opposite now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good times.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we've been sent a lot of stuff over the last couple months and we're aware we don't actually have time to open everything but we're going to do our best to at least-- The crew has been generous enough to figure out some interesting stuff and put it all together in an order of interest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Liam and Matt are on the way by the way! It's not just gonna be us three alone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Travis and Sam are on their way but they'll be here by Thursday.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! There's somebody!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Speak of the devil!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You made it sooner than you thought! Why are you holding a bunch of stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are Critmas gifts from Joe Manganiello for you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! We were just talking about that! Oh my-- what!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is new dice for you to burn through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really? Did he give me that glittery gold one I saw online, because I wanted it so bad!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are for you, Liam, Travis, and Ashley because you guys need to take notes so Marisha isn't the only one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then you and Sam got afterthoughts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's excellent, my favorite.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at these beautiful!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh those are cool!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now they're Yin and Yang, it's like me and Vax!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They are and they're kind of slightly see-through. Thanks Joe! Starting Critmas right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're warm. Where have they been?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My car.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm really hoping that's a euphemism. There we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My car!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ampersand!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By the way, I didn't realize when I made the white dragon armor that me and Vax are now white and black, which is so

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're like the Rihanna S&M music video! Or when her and Britney did it together, she was in white and she was in black?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was thinking like Oreo cookies. Or Yin and Yang.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope, I went straight to Rihanna and Britney Spears. Okay, let's open things!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey everyone! I'm taking my shoes off because I want to stink up the place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have socks on, so I feel weird about taking these off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was going to say it's weird that you don't have socks on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! Maybe I should have worn socks or my Birkenstocks would have been better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have some coffee! For me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's for everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, either of those two mugs are yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Matt, this one's apparently for your eyes only, and it's heavy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My eyes only.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at this cutie, can I open it? Or is this for all of us to-- Should I just start going? Number one, this envelope has the most adorable stickers on it. Including a llama, like Henry, that is a painting in me and Travis's house.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Henry, I love Henry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? What are you laughing at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has here stats for and some cool elements of creatures. So thank you very much. This is going to go into future use.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get, Taliesin?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Terry Kobel, I hope I am pronouncing that right, got me a beautiful copy of "English "Pistols and Revolvers," leatherbound!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is Taliesin porn. That is a direct hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to look at the foiled edges. I'm so pleased.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take this off?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. This is beautiful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Show us some pages. Open it up, and show us some pages on the inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. It's just gorgeous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. Go back to the other page.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There it is! How did you find that again upside-down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know how. It's just magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that a flintlock design?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is actually a beautiful piece of lock. I'm going to be reading this. I am very excited.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is cool!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is beautiful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're all dice bags, you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Says she made these right after Vax had died. This is right before-- spoilers-- the resurrection of Vax. She didn't know if he was going to be alive when she made these. We're supposed to guess whose is whose. I'm guessing that's yours since it's got the-- and that one is mine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's got the bird skull and evil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And this one is Scanlan's. It's Matt's. I don't know. She double layered them. This is Travis because it's got bones and it's Groggy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is Pike, I'm going to say. Yeah, definitely for Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is Scanlan. This has got to be Scanlan with the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! And this is Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And this is Keyleth! Yay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With the antlers!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is adorable. This is from Karen. Thank you, Karen. And bidet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for my fist warmer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's something in here. (shouting) Oh my God!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She crocheted me little Trinket ears!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's adorable. Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so freaking cute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's Terry from Illinois.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where do I put this stuff? I've got so much, I don't know what to do with it. That's yours. That's Liam's.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This one I actually opened first. This person whose name is Joshua Owen Lusack or Valkyrian Fate. Josh sent me an awesome knife, that it was the first thing I opened when we pre--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Directing mode Liam!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am a professional.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You look like a professor in a JRPG.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You never look this nice when we're working.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are ultimate sempai, right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here, do you want a crochet dice bag?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you bring your own coffee?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Coffee? Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and you can share the other cup of coffee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you need right now to is fill in your glasses with some white color so we can't see your pupils.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my God.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Joshua also sent me a bunch of Sixlets.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god! Those are very exciting. I have some plans for those.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) These are Sixlets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whoa! They made pearlescent Sixlets?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And here's a bag that I'm going to open right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These look like BB pellets.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, I feel like I want to be witnessed. That's really exciting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who sent these, who sent these?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kieran. Kieran sent those.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "For the stealthiest and gloomiest boy ever." It's like they know me. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: @kirkwallman on Twitter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love my tag, too. I'm not even going to read it. It's so much wonderful shade. That's so much shade. I love it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do we open next?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Um, any one. Pick one, Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How's everybody's day?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty good, pretty good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's someone who sent us all a bunch of sniper laser pointers that I dropped.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's awesome! Thank you for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is for Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are they?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This one's for the twins. They're laser scopes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys lose the ones I got you, it doesn't matter, but if you lose the ones a Critter got you... So hold on to that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not our fault the Twitch stage is insanity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, this is true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know where things end up once they land on that stage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We finally have a storage place to put our stuff in between shows, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what they look like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, what? This is a little intense. Oh! The batteries now make sense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it's such a big box for batteries.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was a weird battery box that we were shown, and they were like, "Do you know why "you ordered batteries?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we blind each other with these?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. More importantly, we can blind Matt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leon Kennedy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to know which direction-- I'm so sorry that I'm about to do this. I don't know how to help it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyone want some Sixlets?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like the Macy's Day Parade.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This feels like it could be really bad, just to throw Sixlets at the camera.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, good catch, Courtney.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else want Sixlets off-camera? Got it, nice! Anybody else over there? So close! Sorry, we're having a Sixlets battle, apparently, off to the side, there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This looks so real. It's so warm over here, next to the fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh wow. That's a lot of laser.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would recommend you not ever shine those in my eyes, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They also come with a triggering mechanism. This is really nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've never had Sixlets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trigger to what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll love this, this is great. This is nothing but a good idea. This'll go so well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, you're opening right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this another box? Is this what you just pulled out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Yes, it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do I do it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See the end of that coil? That's a squeezy trigger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Whoa!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is from--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to shine it towards you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is from TrappedFox, and it says, "Dear Liam."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's see. Open the box.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm in no way going to abuse this. Not going to abuse this at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my gosh, that's perfect. Well, I'm going to read this. You know, I'm always gun-shy about reading things right away, because then there's a little hidden note that says, "By the way, PS, "don't read this on the air." Oh man, I launched out of work like a cannon and I still got here late.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the meantime, there wasn't a card yet, but I think it came out of this box. Someone sent me this steampunk tarot set, which I have admired from afar for quite a while, but I'm going to-- I'm very excited.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fucking awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And now it is inside of me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. That got weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. (singing) There is a thing here. Whoa, what is this? What the heck?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I appreciate all of it, and I really hope you "enjoy." The fanmixes! She made us mixes!

lines.text: They're mixtapes.

lines.text: That is awesome! Yay, I got a mixtape!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is for Ashley, this one's mine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a copy for-- Mary gets one for Zahra, there'll be another batch for Kashaw. Oh man, that's so cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you have maybe a series of NPC ones.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's amazing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is going to sit on my desk. Thank you, Chad. This is a very special gift. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's brilliant. That's actually genuinely really brilliant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, I'm really touched. Thank you for that. Wow. This is not a die, this is a murder weapon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it heavy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anyone who rolls up in my office is gonna get bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, it's so beautiful. Do you want to roll it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here, I'll hide it. Don't tell the truth. You've got the word "lie" right in your name. It's a 20! It was a three. It still means a lot to me, that's going to go right on my office desk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so pretty, though. These fanmixes are so awesome. Mine's called "Winddancer". That's really pretty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have to open mine, hang on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, I don't even want to look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll listen to this on my drive over before the game, so I can get in my Vex mood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just two hours of Gregorian chant.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One bullet is all I need.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need a box to put this stuff in. I don't know what to do with the trash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trash box? I tend to just throw it into the ether.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did we get the name of the fan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My arm movement wasn't on screen of that, like, pathetic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sis! Who made these?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: @DruidKeyleth.

lines.text: Mine's called "Cloudburst".

lines.text: She made a Briarwood mix. That's so exciting.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it? What did you get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll show you as soon as I get it all out.

lines.text: What do you have over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll show you once I get it all out, be patient!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did anybody send me some candy or some brownies or maybe a donut?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, there was another candy box over there, hang on.

lines.name: OFF-SCREEN
lines.text: Go for one of the Australian boxes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One of the Australian boxes, hang on. See what's going on in there, because that's got Whoppers on top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, somebody did send candy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we got a peek at Whoppers. I was gonna say, we don't know what goes any further than that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's Whoppers and Skittles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, sweet and sour Skittles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, these are all for you, Marisha. Oh my gosh. Wait, wait. You read that, and I'll pull this out, because I want to show it to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay. Oh man. Okay. "Well-wishes and congrats, Keyleth, for completing her "Aramente, though now she gets to begin the stress of becoming a leader of her tribe and working "through Vax's death, but regardless, I wanted to make something and settled on a shawl, because "girl, how are you cold--" Oh my god! This is so cool! This is rad. What does the back look like? I'm going to use the vanity monitor to see. It's beautiful!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Looks like a microphone hookup.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It looks like a lav. "I wanted to make something and settled on a shawl." Because I do sometimes get cold.

lines.text: Are we opening the Whoppers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we will, but we also have these.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so rad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Miles of candy. Where did Taliesin go? There he is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Maple Scribbles! This is amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is for Brian and Denise and the wonderful people of Talks Machina. "Thank you for "bringing such an informative, fun, creative show each week. I hope that the TimTams lead to more "amazing times. From Shantel. Thank you ever so much Shantel. If Brian were here, I'm sure he "would say thank you as well."

lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Black Forest TimTams, Caramel TimTams.

lines.text: Guys, Emerita Colleen, elf. First off, great letter. I'm going to go ahead and read this offscreen, as per your request. However, she has made, by hand, some miniatures. Tiny rat Grog.

lines.text: Wait, she made that?!

lines.text: She made these with actual removable sword of Craven Edge, which looks amazing. That's actually really cool and really well made, with his throwing hammer and chain of returning attached, which is fantastic. There is a little Pike that has her holy symbol and her mace, which is adorable. Little armor on and everything. And then for you, Laura Bailey, there is your Vex, right? You have to actually string your bow, but it's a bow with two arrows of dragon slaying attached.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? This is crazy. Look at this cuteness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Isn't it adorable? So we will put these on the Talks Machina set until the corresponding individuals come to retrieve them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so cute. I feel like Vanna White.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much, Emerita. These are really amazing! I'm going to put them on set right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got to string my bow, yo.

lines.text: What's up, Dani Carr?

lines.text: You startled her with her name. It's weird. Oh God. Someone is saying my name. Okay, these are fun. This is from Brandy Ires aka @elvyralani on Twitter. She says she has been watching us since the beginning, that she plays a druid because of me.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Love you.

lines.text: Love you. "I've been wanting to make you something for quite some time, months and months "actually. While I have never been able to draw, I am a crafter. You'll see that I made each of you a "cross stitch featuring your characters."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think so. "You might see some fun color play across a few of them." These are her own patterns. "Matt, I am working on a special one for you that will come at a later time."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's made of gravy. I don't know what that means. It's been a long couple of weeks. I'm going crazy.

lines.text: Thank you so much, Brandy! Okay, ready? Here's Scanlan Shorthalt.

lines.text: I unstrung it. Are you sure that's a Trinket?

lines.text: It says Trinket on bonsai. There's a bunch of pictures here of the minis they've made.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is amazing. Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a bird, you know. That makes sense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Alt universe. I got it. Aw!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. Wait, let me hold them straight.

lines.text: I wish I could show these to my Grandma O'Brien.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here you go, Taliesin. What's it say?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I live as long as Whitestone lives." Oh, I was preparing for, "Life needs things to--" Oh, look at it with the little mask! Oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Happiness is a cursed gun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a really nice-- Oh, you've got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, man. Yeah I do. Since last week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh! "It's the only way to really grow!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike is, "I am a monstah!" Oh my gosh!

lines.text: Is Travis watching? Baby, look!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, are we a football game?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't watch this while you're driving, Travis!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you so much, Brandy! This is amazing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I see other people's? Can I see your stack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, "And I walk away."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Every week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, bitches. Do you want to open the coconut and lychee, the salted caramel and vanilla-- that's my top choice-- or the Black Forest?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think salted caramel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think Black Forest sounds really fucking good too. Dark chocolate and cherry, or salted caramel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, that's a rough choice. You pick. It's your choice, Laura. You have to decide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's open both the Black Forest and the salted caramel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that your final answer?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here, you open this one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dani! Dani!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one looks exciting. I'm going to search.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like, if Ashley was watching this on her vacation, she'd want to come home from her vacation just to eat this salted caramel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's nice and warm. Slippery.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's in here is cool, but I want to see if there's a name anywhere. No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to be an adult now and do a Tim Tam Slam, out of red wine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did do a Tim Tam slam once, when I was in Australia. It was a very good thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that a thing there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's something I did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty good, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is the only way to sneak methamphetamines. So guys, we got some custom-made Pop! toys, and there's notes inside, so I'm just going to hand them out. You play Percy. You play Kiki.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the Black Forest Tim Tam slam with red wine, legitimately really good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pass this on down to my boyfriend Shaun Gilmore, and then we'll hold Grog and Scanlan and Pike here. I'm taking the Vax out. Taking Vax out is a euphemism.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, this is happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to read my letter before I open the present.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to do the same.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is from Carly Scott!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's it from?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Carly Scott!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, @rudenesses is the Critter who gave me the "Raishan Shot First" T-shirt that I wore recently! So thank you again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By the way, she says that Vex is her favorite. I just want to put that out there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, she meant Vax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got to say, the amount of unbelievable handwriting that comes my way because of this is always spectacular.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many people are watching us reading?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love it. "Yep, Florida. I know." That's just a great one-liner in general.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I can't wait to look! And with glitter tape, too!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, thank you so much, Carly!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! And she's winking! That's adorable!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw, look at little Gilmore! Oh my god! He's amazing! Look at that man's majesty! I love his little cuffs!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's got coppery, shiny hair!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where will this show? I'm going to put this right behind-- can you see her behind Liam?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is so cute! Look at the earring! Did I get an earring too? Oh my god, we all have earrings!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god, she looks awesome! You do, you have little sparkle earrings! Oh my god, Percy, yours looks so good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Carly, thank you so much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love our earrings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The hair is really killing me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need some Krazy Glue for his ear! We got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, this is from Shantelle and she crocheted a scarf. She said it reminded her of Keyleth's spellcasting. Wow, that's awesome! Wow, that's crazy! How are you guys so talented? How is everyone so good? Oh, look how pretty. Hey buddy, first Tim Tam?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, screw you. Oh, it's melting in my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're a little warm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we need music or something.

lines.name: DENISE
lines.text: We have the fireplace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it is? Oh, so other people can hear that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Shantelle!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I haven't had a sugar snack in weeks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, do we just pick one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, maybe? This looks like something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, I'll take this one, whatever this one is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. I can't tell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's from Mark Ball.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is for Vax and Percy. This is for Marisha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi Matt. Lately, I've been having nightmares. In my dreams, you are playing the new "Mansions of Madness expansion, but with unpainted figures, or even worse, sometimes "professionally painted miniatures. These minis don't match up to the amateurish paint job that I "did on the core set. I don't want to live in a world where you have to play Mansion of Madness "with mis--" Oh! You guys have the actual, the original set with painted minis, which I still use? Oh my god! And donated $50 to the Nature Conservancy for Marisha Ray, which is fantastic, from Mark Ball. That's incredible! Mark, it's amazing! And the new Beyond the Threshold Mansions of Madness expansion. Wow. Oh, the minis! Oh! I'm so happy! Oh, wow! You make me a happy man, Mark!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's awesome. I really want to play now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We haven't messed with the expansion. This is new to the second edition.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, the newest one? Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is all stuff we haven't played yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's now your mini. I love the green gems together!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just took this from her hand. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's good. Here, I'm trying to see a little bit of a backdrop now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really hard to do that. Brian does it every week with the Wyrmwood and it's hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's so cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lauren G. Meyers sent Taliesin and I skull casts. Wow. Thank you so much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you going to make a--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. I'm definitely going to do something exciting with it. Something exciting's going to happen with it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I might be able to do something with this soon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I tapped my microphone like a terrible person. Thank you so much. This will be added into something fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, I recognize these! It looks like there's another red!

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Screw those bastards!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, what are these?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unicorns! Who are they for?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's see, because we already got the first round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I took the white one last time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She said sorry for her crappy writing, that her two-year-old was demanding her attention at the time of writing this. "Dearest Matthew Mercer and Marisha Ray--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Having watched the Vox Machina methodically--" Hang on, wait. Oh, "destroy the "dragons, therefore--" Right, hang on. Aw, she wanted us to have a complete set.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's so sweet!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so much work!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She knew I didn't want to give up Raishan to Patrick, which I still haven't yet, so that we could actually give the original to Patrick and I could have the second Raishan. This is amazing. I can't believe that you went through all of this again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it say that we have to give the pegasus to somebody specific, or does it say that, if you're at the opening of the Critmas presents, and you really like the pink pegasus, you can have it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laura, take it. It's yours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was an alicorn to represent Gilmore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, for Shaun? That's amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How's that reading going for you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And apparently, wait, gray elephant?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. There's a gray dragon. Oh no! We're missing a gray elephant!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right? "Also, the gray elephant is for Taliesin." Right? That does say--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does. I think it does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "One blunderbuss away from becoming a quarterman."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's pretty cute. Highly entertained.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyway, thank you so much, Stacy! These are all Stacy and Glenn for round two.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We will read your letter in detail later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one doesn't say who it's from, unless it's from the company Field Notes Brand, but it's a bunch of little field notebooks, and I can only believe that somebody wants the rest of us to take the heat off Marisha and start taking notes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take notes! Just not as good as Marisha takes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we have pillars. You're good as the treasury.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do take really detailed treasury notes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you do take detailed treasury notes, and Travis takes detailed Bag of Holding notes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Different colors and types, so Laura, you can tear through as many to your heart's content of various dice sets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want some! Laura doesn't get them all!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All for me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have two large bags, so you guys have plenty. We can go through and distribute. I'm going to put them over here. And a letter that I'm not going to say because he's nudging things that you players need to remember anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's a wonderful present from Kristin and Brad, and I'm going to read this letter because it's short and it's perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who wants some Bilar? Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I don't know what that is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're like gummies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll eat it. "We figured you guys were getting tired of looking up potion types all the "time, so we made these super awesome bottles for you to use on your adventures. One set for each "table. Each bottle contains the appropriate number of d4s that you need for your roll, ranging from "common to supreme. Good luck, and keep being awesome. Kristin and Brad." Kristin and Brad are super duper cool, and by the way, have we ever had a supreme healing potion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have? With 20d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not 20d4.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, superior, eight. Supreme, 20. We've never had a supreme.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll double-check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had been working on putting one of these together, and now I don't have to, which is very pleasing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit! I don't know who this came from, but this is a journal, it's a leather journal, and they've got "kaitiake" stamped in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god, that's awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it spelled right? Is that how you spell "kaitiake"?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The green ones don't taste as good as the pink ones.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "You spice?" And Matthew's say "How do you derr-de-derr-derr?" But some of them are lesser-known. Grog's is "I have an intelligence of six, I know what I'm doing." Keyleth's says "We're "all cows, just embrace it." Percy's medium-iconic, "I'm in the pyjamas with the butt-flap. The "butt-flap is down." Pike, "This temple goes to a six." Vex's say, "I'm going to attack it twice, "because I'm original." And Vax's says, "She's working for the Illuminati and we're basically the "A-Team, so I think she might know a little better." Thank you very much, Derek.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These are for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a thought. I'll show one of them, just so they get the notion of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've found the right note, so @AC_teamkilla is actually from Sweden, it says, "Greetings from "Sweden." And this is a box of their love and glory of Grog. So most of these gifts are for Grog, so the two big bags of dice? They're for Grog. The drinking horn in here? That's for Grog. So I'm going to put those in here, and you can bring those home to Travis, and he can enjoy and distribute as he sees fit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, Travis said that anything that he got when he's not here goes to me, so I will take those home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gave me metal dwarven dice as well. That's fantastic. That is really, really cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, wait. This is from-- hold on, I've got to see who it's from, because this is really cool. This is from Jay Anthony Pierpoli and the rest of the Critter community, who sent, number one, a fanfiction that I will definitely read that they say is phenomenal by Sarah Louise Harper. And also, this is so cool, I wish Sam was here. I'm opening his present for him, because I like opening things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (exclamations)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is incredible. Look at the leather-work on that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, it's amazing! He said he made it before he realized Scanlan was not here. How cool is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's badass. Little holders, too!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Insane! Where's his little mug? Is it up here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me check. I'll go get it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do this and hope to not make a mess. Hah. Oh, wow, we've lost Matt. Oh yeah, the mug's probably in the-- yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then-- oh, I see what you're doing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to put it on so he'll have it in the next show when he finally brings his mug out again. Oh my god! It looks so cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're not going to tell him about it. He'll just find it with it on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man. I don't have anything. I'll take it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, Matt, this is from Beth Fleven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From Joseph, we need to remember it's from Joseph.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She sent us something in a diapers box. I don't know if that's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think she's sick and tired of us getting up in the middle of the game. Message received. That will be the last time you saw any of us get up in the middle of the game.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Check this out. Check this out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Best t-shirt I've ever been sent. Of all the other t-shirts I've been sent, this is the best one. Look at that!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is a very fluorescent orange shirt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, and I will don it proudly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go jogging in that shirt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I fear these, but not for the same reason. Thank you. Thank you very much. Oh, I'm going to be in trouble when I bring these home. Oh, this is so exciting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This print-art shirt is from Jeff Kielessen, who lives where many of my kin live.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so Beth wrote a letter to Matt and I, but the gift is for Liam. Beth is thanking us for the game, she says, "Enclosed in this box is a handmade gift for Liam. I began making it just "after he defeated Thordak. I thought it fitting that the slayer of Thordak should have one of the "eggs to keep as a trophy." There you go, bud.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I see the letter? Hold on. Oh, man. Oh, I got a letter, too. I'm going to read the letter first. No, you all are waiting on me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, too bad, I'm doing this one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at this amazing motherfucker right here. Oh, yes! Yes. Ah, facehugger's in it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I did it! It's on. That is ridiculous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How heavy is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now fill it with liquid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. How does he pick this up? Does he pick it up one-handed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gnome strength.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does he put on the bottom? Oh, it's his little code.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is this from? This is "To Matthew Mercer." Where is this from?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From Elliott Cole from Australia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is in the thing? What are you finding in the thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, let's see what happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! This is so cool! This is from Jennifer Knight. She designed this and stitched it herself, with a panel for each character, and these panels are super duper detailed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love the frame on this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The frame is awesome! The freaking stitching is awesome! With museum glass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where a bunch of nerdy-ass voice actors roll dice and play Dungeons & Dragons. Aw!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at these panels! This is so cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so great!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should hang this on set.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fantastic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm actually excited because we have room for art suddenly because we just redecorated a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wow, it's really well done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beth, thank you, and thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Amazing! What's happening?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what this is. But things are happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Progress is occurring. (singing) Freedom! Sweet freedom, freedom! You've got to give what you take.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They wrapped this very well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever it was is in seven pieces.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another door!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a small door. It would make so much sense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you getting it out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're getting there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so curious now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just an infinite amount of wrapping! All the way down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my God! You guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What? It's a guitar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pink.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What! Whoa! Oh my God!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling) What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is so cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On the set!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Gilmore voice) "That is glorious. What else can you say but, that's glorious?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to hold this, Matthew?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now you know where to shop, am I right?" That is incredible!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we just won the lottery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look in the back, it has our symbol engraved! Elliott Cole, incredible work, Elliott! That is amazing! One day at home I'm like, "You know, just make up some magic shop with some dude named "Gilmore." Years later-- That's amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if it'll fit in one of those boxes above Trinket's head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a bit big for one of those.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I mean the cross-stitching. Gilmore can maybe go right there next to the other Gilmore! Gilmore is world famous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just want this in front of our house now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right! Can you just hang that in your living room? I wouldn't blame you if you want to take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then I'm going to take it home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just above your bed?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need more hooks. We definitely need more hooks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really remarkable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't function right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's done so well!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's done

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have not seen it up close. Oh my God, really? What lunacy. What lunacy is this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is something for Sam. So many Critters were involved in this. So many! This is a list of the Critters involved in the making of this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that the same people who do the quotes? It's a quilt?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. This for Sam, we should show it on air, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I feel like Sam should be the one that opens it up, though. It's his quilt?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But like, don't we want to acknowledge the work put into this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I loved mine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. God, I recognize so many names on this list. Yeah, that's what we'll do. We'll bring it on Thursday on the top of the show.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For Sam for later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I think these are fun. That one goes to Liam. This one's Taliesin, Laura, and Matt. We already pulled Ashley and Sam's and Travis' and put them over there. Isn't it adorable?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, read the card!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, they put 'Risha' on here. I haven't been called Risha since high school.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There once was a DM called Matt/He could swap characters at the drop of a hat/His city he "burned/But his trust was returned/And his story never once fell flat."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "What can I say about lovely Laura/Her friends and the fandom adore her/Her comebacks are "quick/Her winks are slick/There's not a soul alive that abhors her."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Marisha, a word to the wise/There are those in the world who despise/Rise above the "hate/Spread love to relate/Or just crush them with your strong-as-heck thighs." (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's amazing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that a feat you took?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Chun Li thighs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "It's hard to write rhymes about Taliesin/Wild imagination he's boundless in/The "true executive goth/With words he's no sloth/But his deeds you can find no malice in."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I can think of a few.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can think of a few, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, seriously, it's life or death. There's nothing to joke about. This is Dungeons and Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much, Vee, these are so cute!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all shirts of my face. What? What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're team hoodies! They are team hoodies!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, mine says 'Keteor'!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: #FateTouched.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hunter's Mark. What's yours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's incredible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Team hoodies! Just in case you guys didn't know who I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Multi-hood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We multi-hooding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm multi-hooding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got to go bowling right after the show.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) We have to go bowling in our hoodies!

lines.name: OFFSCREEN
lines.text: Nerdiest biker gang.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're not wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we just all go somewhere in our hoodies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is ridiculous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's awesome. Wait, who's that from? That's from Vee. But I can't see the full name, it just says Vee!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we got chocolates from her, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And she gave chocolates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Vee, you're amazing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or he!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And chocolate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Vee. You don't know what Vee is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have so many more boxes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just like making Max do stuff, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm getting a little warm, actually. I was okay, and then I realized, no, I'm cooking a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From @lightningsource, the book of-- what? What?! 5e game supplement, The Book of the Tarrasque.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is-- oh no! That's the scary guy, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no, he's fun, he's the teddy bear of D&D.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that the big scary figure that I saw at your house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's lying, Laura, he's lying!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one, you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yells) Yeah, that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's so cool! It's like a tarrasque coloring book/adventure module-- oh my god, this book is so cute! It's so awesome! With a foreword by Ed Greenwood. Yeah, baby. Got some Forgotten Realms blood in this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone sent Chozo fine quality coffee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe there's weed in there! That's how people--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Send weed. Where does it open?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't hear that from us. I just had heard that on the internet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm genuinely excited because the base rules for the tarrasque in 5e are all right, but there are some cool elements of the tarrasque from previous editions that didn't make it in. This has a whole separate page for optional tarrasque rules, which include things like its tiered regeneration, which I kind of miss, and other cool elements. The rush-- oh my god, trample-- (cackles) I'm so excited! This is so cool! I didn't know this book existed! I'm so happy! Who sent this? I don't know who sent this. This is from @lightningsource. I guess?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sometimes there's a little slip of paper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't laugh at me. I'm forever 12, okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taliesin, you can laugh at me if you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, I feel like I've earned that right. I've seen things. Terrible, terrible things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What? I got a-- "Guaranteed forever, Husky utility knives". That's actually extremely handy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's set. He's three daggers in. I've got a tag on the inside of my sleeve. I've got to get it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, thank you, whoever sent utility knives.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a note with--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi Matt. After watching you post Christmas "holiday on Periscope with Marisha and Taliesin and Brian, I thought these might come in handy. Love "the show and everything you do. Please avoid needing stitches. Casey Wall." Yep, you knew exactly what I was talking about. Those are actually going to be really handy. That's so awesome. Thank you so much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They sent box-cutters?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. We kept losing ours, and we couldn't find the one of the two we had, and then two disappeared. Thank you very much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Vicky Banks made us individual goodie bags with different things in them. I'm going to pass yours down. There's a letter with each. I read the overall letter. Thank you, Vicky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Vicky.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The bags are individualized. I got a theatre nerd bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have "Life needs things to live."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that's Marisha's.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Call me 'child' one more time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With Hamilton on the bag! Did you guys get Hamilton on the back of yours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mine has the Witcher symbol on it, I'm so happy. It has the medallion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mine has little grasping vines.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh! Ooh, a Thor's hammer on a string, excellent. I will wear that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got a wine cork. They know. They know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, blue glitter. No, that will go. I know what that is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, this is adorable. It's because I am the winespeaker. Eat, drink, and be married.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's wonderful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, hi, you guys. Do you like my new hat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fantastic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know what you're laughing at. What's this? I don't know what this is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, this is an amazing letter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Gollum voice) What is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is an amazing letter from Marsha Hanif, or @1opinonated on Twitter, and she tells this amazing story about her and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Too many heads.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: --about one of her characters getting into a fight because she didn't want to get thrown into a fight that they couldn't handle on their mission, and it reminded her of Keyleth versus Kima in the Underdark and how much their game has become better by watching Critical Role. Thank you so much for all the kind words, Marsha, this is amazing. Truly amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got an awesome Matthew bottle opener. Sorry, I'm still going through Vicky's present.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, me too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, it's got layers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gloves and hat. Oh, this is so cute!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome. Mercer '82.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got a DCA: Dice Collectors Anonymous t-shirt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about time you finally admitted you had a problem, Laura.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Thank you, Vicky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are so cute! Oh my god. I love the bag, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's adorable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are from Dennis Archimbault Jr. I should not read things from the side. Dennis Archimbault Jr. sends a bag that is-- it's a pizza box.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, it's been over 30 minutes, so it's free.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's kidneys. It could be a dead thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god. This is a person's entire Warhammer ogre army collection, handpainted by them. All of their individual Warhammer ogre minis. This is awesome. They said they haven't touched them in about five years, so "in interest of the minis finding a better life than spending "eternity on a shelf, decided to bequeath them unto you." I hit my microphone, sorry. These are amazing. These handpainted ogres.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, they're really detailed. Look at that guy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dennis, not only did you do an amazing job on painting these, but I have all the ogres-- oh yeah, I know that guy. That's incredible. The ogres are some of the cooler models in the old Warhammer fantasy stuff. That one, let's pull it out, let's see what he's all about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got like a mask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's this thing? (gasps) It's a little goblin in there! And he goes on his back. Goblin down, goblin down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There he goes. He's got like a standard with a little goblin riding on his back. That's so cool! Dennis, you're amazing! I will take good care of this. Thank you so much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're turning into one of those old ladies from Labyrinth with the 500 things on her back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, totally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A really eclectic grandma.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Matt. Are you okay with this being your future?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I was just assuming we'd both be bag people eventually. I make no illusions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got to get over to the 99-cent store before they close for the day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We live in the Valley, we die in the Valley, all right? Thank you so much, Dennis.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Do you have any purple soda left?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dennis, oh my god. Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that full? Oh my god. Did we open everything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Conclave is complete!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh gosh, oh gosh, here's the letter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Read the letter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, I'm reading it. This is to the cast of Critical Role. Wow. "Congratulations. The "adventure that spanned nearly a year, taking our intrepid heroes across the planes of existence to "the very threshold of death's door and back, has finally come to an end. Enclosed is the mounted "head of the final member of the Chroma Conclave to fall to the valiant Vox Machina, Raishan, the "Diseased Deceiver." This is so cool. "What an adventure this has been. This little undertaking "started just as a fun project to work on with my sister, and thank you all for the wonderful work "that you do to bring this amazing story to so many, but it quickly turned into something much "more important than that. It was the spark that reignited my passion for my craft and rekindled my "love for the wonderful shared storytelling experience of Dungeons and Dragons, and for that, "I can't thank you enough. With the death of the final member of the Chroma Conclave--" (exclaiming)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love that they're to scale.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sometimes you've got to go to the doctor, even, if it's too big--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do it at home with a pencil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's satisfying, I think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You gave me that mirror.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "It has a been a truly incredible experience to be able to share my sister's and my talents with you "all, and with the amazing Critters. We now embark to find our next project and see where that will "take us. If I could make one request: when you get all of the mounts hung, could you get us a picture "of the set, please? That would make me and my sister two very happy Critters."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, don't worry. I love in the back it's written here "HDYWTDT, Kerrek, 1-27-2017". They signed it. "They have weathered the Iron Storm, starved the Hope Devourer, thawed the Frigid Doom, "eradicated the Diseased Deceiver, and extinguished the Cinder King. They are Vox Machina." (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also says, "Liam, the offer still stands." Do you know what this is? "If you or your kids "would like a custom trophy mount to commemorate their victory over a mighty foe", they'd be happy to send one your way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, wow. I'll take that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were my favorite villains.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was hoping you'd live until the next campaign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, too bad Vox Machina killed you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That's okay. It was a fitting end.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We saved thousands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did in the long run. How cool is that? Check it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How heavy is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty light, actually. Thordak's the big, heavy one, as it should be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love that they're all kind of to scale based on--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, I can't wait to see all of them hung up next to each other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, I can't wait, I hope to live to see that after civilization falls and you guys trick out your Mad Max car with five dragon heads on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't you even worry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like these are just too fragile to be in a car fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, if we all have shotguns, we'll keep the attackers away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're not fighting with the dragon heads, they're just intimidation tactics.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I'm saying if they're hanging on the front of your Mad Max car, they're going to get damaged!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. We'll figure it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but they'll be witnessed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They will be witnessed. Witness me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, is this something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where should I put this so it doesn't get damaged?

lines.name: OFF-SCREEN
lines.text: I think that should go on the set.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, I'm thinking, now that we have all the heads and if we get the new set finished, we might put them all up in the new set.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got the wall as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got new flats coming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, there's a lot of new space for art.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we've hinted at it. We just don't know exactly when we're going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hope you enjoy it. All the best, your friendly "neighborhood Bonertown."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Bonertown!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where has he been? I'm sure he's still been around, I just feel like I haven't heard of Bonertown in a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there should be fine. Oh. What!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to be a two-person job, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha. Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no. Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turn that to the camera. That is incredible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I already know where that's going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The gold foil ink is nuts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bonertown! Oh my god. You guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You made sure the tape on that side didn't touch the picture, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm pretty sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's just keep that away from it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy crap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that everything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got a couple things over here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's also this. I want to put this somewhere super safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To Critical Role, from Kyle Jackson." (laughs) Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop hogging the joke!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have an updated one. "Mercer & Four Eyes & Antlers & Taryon Darrington & Doty & Short Stuff "& Jumbo & Little Elf Boy & Little Elf Girl & Friendly Bear." That is brilliant. Well, I'm wearing that on Thursday.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be great, because you need to get back at Sam for something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? When I find time, I'm going to get him back so hard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone, don't tweet at him. Don't tweet at Sam, he doesn't have to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a precursor. This is an accidental venture. I have things planned.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a big page of limericks and some gifts from Adam Schwartz, Tiamat_ZX, who I see active on Twitter. He's sent us a big page of limericks. I'm going to read two, because there's a lot. Let's do both of Sam's. "Oh Scanlan he could lie and deceive/But when alone his mother he "would grieve/He never showed his true colors/To himself nor the others/But by the time they knew, "he'd made his leave." Too soon. "If you've heard of Tary the daring/Then you know he is quite "overbearing/He's naive and a fool/But he's skilled with a tool/And his compassion is not a red "herring."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And he sent along two Dungeons and Dragons Kre-O sets that I am commandeering for Sam and my children. Thank you, thank you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Those are cool! I didn't know they made Lego sets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it's not Lego, it's Kre-O.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Those are pretty cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Comes with catapult, goblet, and tiny fish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it say 'tiny fish'?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's just there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, the Hobbit Lego, Gollum comes with tiny fish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does this one come with tiny fish?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, but if it doesn't, I don't want it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, well, Sam's kids can have that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't understand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It comes with a treasure chest with keys and gold coins and another catapult and a spider, but no tiny fish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I think we have one more over there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got another one over here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're reaching the end, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That one, and then I think that one's the last one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This sounds like dice. It's dice!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give it all to me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. "To Vex and Vax", "To the wonderful cast of Critical Role." You read the one to the twins and I'll read the one to the cast of Critical Role.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okie-dokie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's it from? Joshua Green. Does it say to keep private? I don't know. Australia. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lot of Australia. What's going on down there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "By the way, I need your help, Vex and Vax, and the "help of the rest of Vox Machina, and if you come across any vampires, put a few down for me, and I "hate those mockeries of living." You got it, Velandris Dawncollar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm trying to figure out what's going on. Oh my gosh. What the hell is going on? The green swirl dice. Green swirl dice? Yeah, that says Kiki.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, these are cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This also says Kiki, so that goes to Marisha as well. Laura gets the pink one. Oh, I get none of these. Pass this down to Laura and this to Matt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, these are pretty. I don't have any blue this color.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Lord Fourth Wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, these are actually really pretty blue dice. I've never seen any like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mine's Creamsicle!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but what color is your die?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mine's got a little brown in it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to roll. 18!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, Joshua.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go put it with my dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This here is from Scott Ismael. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you need assistance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe. It's big things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, jeez Louise, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get out of here, cardboard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go, box. Go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No advertisement for Scotch! No! None for you! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's my girl. Not today, not tomorrow, not ever!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh no, Scotch Tape just unfollowed us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow. Wow!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's badass.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We just need him to build a full wall of art, now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can make a gallery wall. I love gallery walls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All those Batman posters in the hallway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! We have a bunch of movie posters in the studio that we didn't make.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They magically vanish over the next 72 hours. That could happen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should have a gallery wall. You're really good at it! Just put Laura on it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laura is the physical reincarnation of Pinterest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scott, this is amazing. And a perfect example that there are many if not all crafts that are artistic in their own way. This is a brilliant piece of woodworking, and I am honored. That is fantastic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He made that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He made that, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it say what kind of woods it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does not say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, that's Critmas in May, you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay, we did it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Packages are not necessarily opened in the order that they are received, nor are they received in the order that they were sent, nor were they necessarily sent in a way that actually was received by us. We have them. We've possibly opened them. We're pretty sure we have them. We don't open everything on air, so it's entirely possible that we did get it, just because sometimes we see a package and get curious. Like a small woodland creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or it says, "Open now or you will be cursed for seven years."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or the PO box office says, "Get your ass over here, god damn it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, they yell at us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "What's wrong with you people?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And as always, we definitely implore you guys to go check out the Critters' Guide to Critmas, if you want to be involved. Check that out first, because there's a lot of great charities that we definitely love you guys to check out and consider donating to, because giving is fun and nice and makes you happy and feel good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And please give to the Planetary Society before our planet implodes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And 826LA, as always, and First Place for Youth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First Book, Nature Conservatory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My Friend's Place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was Sam's? Oh, Pablove. Yeah, there's a lot of great charities that we love and support. So yeah, don't feel like you have to buy us stuff to still experience the joy of Critmas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. In fact, few things bring us more pride than the fact that you guys are giving back to the world and helping those who could use help in many different facets in the name of nerdy roleplaying games.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, and we always read you guys' letters where you talk about running games in schools and libraries and stuff that you guys are doing. We read it all, we have a big notebook that we keep in--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Multiple notebooks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It used to be a notebook. It's not a notebook anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We keep all of the fan letters, so know that even if we don't say out loud, we keep and read all of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You all have excellent handwriting. It's actually very impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! It makes me very self-conscious about my handwriting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very self-conscious about my handwriting thanks to the fandom here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can keep sending pegasi to Laura Bailey, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will gladly accept.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cue all the pegasi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And amazing crocheted goods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys so much! You're amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is amazing. What does Brian always say? Oh, and as always, it's almost Thursday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [upbeat music]
